doc:
Pierre Alcover https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre_Alcover 0 Pierre Alcover (14 March 1893 – 14 November 1957) was a French stage and film actor. He starred in 40 films between 1918 and 1943. In 1920 he starred in the film Champi-Tortu. One of his most notable performances was in Marcel L'Herbier's 1928 film L'Argent, as the corrupt banker Saccard. He was the second husband of the film actress Gabrielle Colonna-Romano, and they are buried together in the cimetière de Rueil-Malmaison. Pierre_Alcover ( 14_March_1893 – 14_November_1957 ) was a_French_stage_and_film_actor . He starred in 40_films between 1918_and_1943 . In 1920 he starred in the_film Champi-Tortu . One of his_most_notable_performances was in Marcel_L'Herbier 's 1928_film L'Argent , as the_corrupt_banker Saccard . He was the_second_husband of the_film_actress_Gabrielle_Colonna-Romano , and they are_buried together in the_cimetière de Rueil-Malmaison .
